about_the_game:
Atlas Online: 2D MMORPG Pirate Adventure

Welcome to Atlas Online, the 2D MMORPG pirate game! In this thrilling pirate adventure, fight for your own glory, conquer islands with your alliance, embark on new adventures, and rule the seas!

Step into a world where every wave holds a treasure and danger lurks around every corner. Gather your crew, customize your ship, and venture into dangerous waters in search of fortune and fame. Form alliances, join epic battles, and emerge as the most feared pirate captain of the seven seas.

With stunning visuals and immersive gameplay, Atlas Online offers an unforgettable adventure for anyone brave enough to embark on the journey. Are you ready to chart your own course, claim your destiny, and become a legend of the high seas?

Join the adventure in Atlas Online today!

name: Atlas Online

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Quad CPU Q8200 @ 2.33GHz 2.33 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Quad CPU Q8200 @ 2.33GHz 2.33 GHz
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Welcome to Atlas Online, the 2D MMORPG pirate game! In this exciting pirate adventure, fight for your own glory, conquer islands with your alliance, embark on new adventures, and rule the seas!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Turkish, Italian
